dcterms:creator: David D Lewis
Yiming Yang
Tony Russell-Rose
Fan Li
dcterms:description: RCV1 dataset contains over 800,000 manually categorized news-wire stories labeled with news category, embedding into 47236 features. It is used in the context of binary classification problems.
dcterms:title: RCV1

dcterms:creator: Ian Goodfellow
Yoshua Bengio
Aaron Courville
dcterms:description: CIFAR-10 is a dataset used for image classification, consisting of 60,000 32x32 color images in 10 different classes, with 6,000 images per class.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10

dcterms:description: MNIST is a dataset of handwritten digits, commonly used for training various image processing systems. It consists of 60,000 training images and 10,000 testing images.
dcterms:title: MNIST
